column5: Back in the fall when I got my boat Phil and Brian offered me a couple of items for it, all I had to do was arrange to get them.  The BOQ weekend was not to far away so I arranged with Brian to give his item to Wayne and if I'm not mistaken GCD picked up the item from Phil.  I finally managed to get myself in gear and drive over to Wayne's today to pick them up...a whole 10 minute drive  .  Phil was good enough to give me a compass to mount in the boat so I don't get lost....this is a good thing as it's not hard for me to do   Brian gave me an Eagle Z7500 Sonar System.  I'm hoping a friend of Steve's will help me hook it up and all I'll have to do is fiugre out how to use it  Thanks again to everyone, Brian and Phil for your generosity and Wayne and GCD for helping me get them    Now all I need is for spring to arrive so I can play with my new toys  Maureen

Your quite welcome Maureen!  Like I said before it seems like you are always the one giving and I thought it was about time you received!  Hope it serves you well!   PS Thanks to Glen and Wayne, I figured that was the best way for it to get there safe and sound.
"Whopper and Slowpoke, as well as Irishfield and GCD"  They are all wonderful people Maureen. I'm proud to be associated with them.
Y'all are quite welcome!!! It was my pleasure!   Now there's just this slight matter of a $300 fuel surcharge fee...
Not to worry Glen,I got ya covered, I'll take care of it at Lakair  Maureen
The surcharge comment was directed at Phil... but as long as I get paid...
OOoops! I thought I had some old mouse traps in that Eagle box! Hope it finds the fishes for ya! -Brian
